org.apache.xpath.axes

Interface PathComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeIterator, AxesWalker, BasicTestIterator, ChildIterator, ChildTestIterator, DescendantIterator, FilterExprIterator, FilterExprIteratorSimple, FilterExprWalker, KeyIterator, KeyRefIterator, LocPathIterator, MatchPatternIterator, NodeCursor, OneStepIterator, OneStepIteratorForward, ReverseAxesWalker, SelfIteratorNoPredicate, UnionChildIterator, UnionPathIterator, Variable, VariableSafeAbsRef, WalkingIterator, WalkingIteratorSorted, XMLNodeCursorImpl, XNodeSetForDOM, XNull

    public interface PathComponent
    Classes who implement this information provide information needed for static analysis of a path component.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAnalysisBits()
      Get the analysis bits for this path component, as defined in the WalkerFactory.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnalysisBits

        int getAnalysisBits()
        Get the analysis bits for this path component, as defined in the WalkerFactory.
        Returns:
        One of WalkerFactory#BIT_DESCENDANT, etc.
